We use Kwizly for our quizzes – find out more here
The year is almost over and it was an eventful one in the world of football.
Manchester City put together an impressive run of results to overtake Arsenal and win the Premier League for the fifth time in six seasons.
Pep Guardiola's side also added the FA Cup and a first Champions League crown to complete a historic treble, while their rivals Manchester United won the Carabao Cup – their first trophy since 2017.
The best features, fun and footballing quizzes, straight to your inbox every week.
Meanwhile, England's Lionesses reached the Women's World Cup final, losing narrowly to Spain. So much more happened in club and international football. How much can you remember?
QUIZZES
Quiz! Can you name every club that has played in the Champions League?
Quiz! Can you guess 50 answers in FFT's Big Champions League quiz?
Quiz! Can you name every club that has played in the Premier League?
Sean Cole is a freelance journalist. He has written for FourFourTwo, BBC Sport and When Saturday Comes among others. A Birmingham City supporter and staunch Nikola Zigic advocate, he once scored a hat-trick at St. Andrew’s (in a half-time game). He also has far too many football shirts and spends far too much time reading the Wikipedia pages of obscure players.
